template<typename T1, typename Alloc1, typename T2, typename Alloc2>
bool thrust::operator== ( const device_vector< T1, Alloc1 > &  lhs,
const std::vector< T2, Alloc2 > &  rhs 
) [inline]

This operator allows comparison between a device_vector & a std::vector.

Parameters:
lhs The device_vector to compare.
rhs The std::vector to compare.
Returns:
true if and only if each corresponding element in either vector equals the other; false, otherwise.
